SimpleDataListSpec.Name: MIMED Tab Names Simple Data List
SimpleDataListSpec.Description: A simple data list that returns mimed tab names records
SimpleDataListSpec.Author: UM Dev

SPSimpleList.c:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_UM_USP_SIMPLEDATALIST_MIMEDTABNAMES as select distinct l.SUBTABID as Value, CASE WHEN l.SUBTABID = '9bd55710-e3fe-4210-aff2-279ac0570f37' THEN 'MIMED Info' WHEN l.SUBTABID = '1ccf9d10-57fa-425c-8c18-9d3286fe6a26' THEN 'Contact' WHEN l.SUBTABID = 'e2980b90-93c0-4d24-9907-148bc61a3d34' THEN 'MIMED Development' WHEN l.SUBTABID = '3f786808-afe8-465e-9125-d8ebce7a63a9' THEN 'Referrals' WHEN l.SUBTABID = 'c912b1cd-cbc9-41d4-ae73-f7be642a6087' THEN 'Visits Summary' WHEN l.SUBTABID = '33e31e17-aa65-42db-ad1a-06563999b697' THEN 'Visits Detail' WHEN l.SUBTABID = '3f47b8c0-4552-4b85-a8ef-ed4cf8733b46' THEN 'Providers' WHEN l.SUBTABID = '2605d220-0622-4020-9fad-98aa7ba742bd' THEN 'Documentation Note' WHEN l.SUBTABID = 'eba534f5-fca2-4c08-97a5-0cb2d3bdfe35' THEN 'MIMED History' END as LABEL FROM [dbo].[USR_UMHS_MIMEDTABVIEWLOG] l order by LABEL
